short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take scalable, semantic, accessible screenshots, in SVG format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SVG screenshots offer various benefits over normal PNG screenshots, while keeping the good parts:

ğŸ–¼ Flexible: Freely select the region of the website you want to capture or capture the whole page.
ğŸ’¢ Scalable graphics: Screenshots never get pixelated when zooming in.
ğŸ“ Semantic: Text can still be selected and copied to clipboard.
ğŸ¦» Accessible: SVG is annotated with ARIA attributes and can be read by screen readers.
ğŸ–¥ Paste into design tools: SVGs will work in design tools like Illustrator, Figma, Sketch etc.
ğŸ”— Interactive: Links are still clickable.
ğŸ“¦ Self-contained: Inlines external resources like images, fonts, etc.
ğŸ“¸ Static: Styles and layout are recorded at the time of snapshot and will not change.
ğŸ—œ Small: Depending on the content, SVGs can be magnitudes smaller than PNGs and compress loslessly.
ğŸ›¡ Secure: The SVG will not contain any JavaScript.
